Objectives and values

MACBA/Plan your visit/Objectives and values

MACBA is an open institution that has as its mission the dissemination of contemporary art. Its aim is to generate a multiplicity of visions and to encourage critical debates on art and culture through activities that engage audiences of all types.
Collaborating with MACBA means actively participating in its focus on education, its desire for innovation, and its commitment to creating and preserving the heritage of the Collection and of its documentary archive.

Accesibility

MACBA has several resources, adapted services and specific aids.

History

Alexandre Cirici-Pellicer created the Associació d’Artistes Actuals in the year 1953
